name: colourlessly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that lacks colour or interest: He had blue eyes and almost colourlessly blond hair, cut very short. His films deal in trite stereotypes, poorly observed and colourlessly portrayed.
More examplesFewer examplesSlate-grey towns blend colourlessly into the muted green countryside.The book delivers its facts colourlessly, with few surprises.She was colourlessly conventional and timid, and easygoing to the point of inertia."Think of it", I said colourlessly, "as your duty".
